artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Koryo Export Development Co., Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Warp printed & handwoven floral pattern. Vert. Rpt. 27"; horiz. Rpt. 24". Peach, celery on bluegrey. Dawnglow

text: This warp-print silk woven in Korea reminds us of the worldwide appreciation of nature as depicted by the late 19th century impressionist painters.
title: Lilium
